sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtssyslogsummary ( occrrnc_de , svc_nm , method_nm , creat_co , updt_co , rdcnt , delete_co , outpt_co , error_co ) VALUES ( #occrrncDe# , #svcNm# , #methodNm# , #creatCo# , #updtCo# , #rdcnt# , #deleteCo# , #outptCo# , #errorCo# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtssyslogsummary SET occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# , svc_nm = #svcNm# , method_nm = #methodNm# , creat_co = #creatCo# , updt_co = #updtCo# , rdcnt = #rdcnt# , delete_co = #deleteCo# , outpt_co = #outptCo# , error_co = #errorCo# WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#
sqlMap.select: SELECT occrrnc_de , svc_nm /* ${attribute.columnComments} */ , method_nm /* ${attribute.columnComments} */ , creat_co /* ${attribute.columnComments} */ , updt_co /* ${attribute.columnComments} */ , rdcnt /* ${attribute.columnComments} */ , delete_co /* ${attribute.columnComments} */ , outpt_co /* ${attribute.columnComments} */ , error_co /* ${attribute.columnComments} */ FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#

SELECT A.occrrnc_de , A.svc_nm , A.method_nm , A.creat_co , A.updt_co , A.rdcnt , A.delete_co , A.outpt_co , A.error_co FROM ( SELECT occrrnc_de , svc_nm , method_nm , creat_co , updt_co , rdcnt , delete_co , outpt_co , error_co , ROWNUM FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY occrrnc_de DESC , svc_nm DESC , method_nm DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE 1 = 1
